ARABIC: إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَرْجِعُكُمْ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You will return to Allah. He has power over all things.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: To God have you to go back, and He has power over everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Unto Allah is your return, and He has power to do everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: To God you will all return. God has power over all things."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “To Allah only you have to return, and He is Able to do all things.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: To Allah is your return, and He is able to do all things."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: To Allah is your return, and He has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: to God shall you return; He is powerful over everything.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Unto Allah is your return, and He is Able to do all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: to God you shall all return; and He has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Unto Allah is your return, and He is over everything Potent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: To Allah will be your return, and He has power over all things.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: To Allah is your return, and He hath power over all things.'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: To Allah is your return, and He is Able to do all things."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: To Allah you shall all return. He has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “To God is your return, and He is Capable of all things.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: To Allah is your return, and He is over all things competent."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [11:4] Unto God is your return, and He has power over all things’, including reward and chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Unto Allah is your return) after death, (and He is able to do all things) whether it is reward or punishment.
